channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox not collected by council, now decomposing on pavement, 1st July
item.description:
A neighbour found a dead fox in their garden and was told to bag it and leave it on the pavement for collection. The animal wasn’t collected and left overnight and animals have now opened the bags and spread it around the pavement. There are guts, maggots, and flies everywhere, and the smell of rot is overwhelming in this heat.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99, Domonic Drive, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Litter scattered all outside 39A as usual, 1st July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sandringham Road, Hackney, London
